Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ENERGY AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS

Title: Relates to the applicability of the freedom of information law to the Long Island Power Authority
Summary: Subjects the Long Island Power Authority and power purchase agreements with third parties to the provisions of the freedom of information law.
LawCode: Add ยง1020-ll, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the applicability of the freedom of information law to the Long Island Power Authority and the disclosure of third party power purchase agreements
